title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1626-2.2 - Tenant placement service
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1626-2.2 - Tenant placement service

State Regulations

In connection with any project, the authority shall
prepare lists of suitable apartments available from private sources and
maintain contact with local real estate brokers so that site and offsite
tenants not interested in public housing can be referred to such available
housing. Publicity in local newspapers requesting suitable apartments for
families to be relocated and classified advertisements offering apartments for
rent should be utilized in preparing such lists. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1626-2.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
